import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import './Account.css' function Account() { const transactions = useSelector((state) => state.transactions) const users = useSelector((state) => state.users) const adminTransactions = useSelector((state) => state.adminTransactions) || [] const adminHoldings = useSelector((state) => state.stocks) || {} const [adminFunds, setAdminFunds] = useState({ totalFunds: 1000000, currentFunds: 1000000, profit: 0, profitPercent: 0, loss: 0, lossPercent: 0, }) const [stockData, setStockData] = useState({}) // For tracking stock buy/sell data useEffect(() => { // Fetch initial data from localStorage const storedAdminFunds = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('adminFunds')) const storedStockData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('stockData')) if (storedAdminFunds) setAdminFunds(storedAdminFunds) if (storedStockData) setStockData(storedStockData) }, []) useEffect(() => { // Save admin funds and stock data to localStorage localStorage.setItem('adminFunds', JSON.stringify(adminFunds)) localStorage.setItem('stockData', JSON.stringify(stockData)) }, [adminFunds, stockData]) const formatTimestamp = (timestamp) => { return new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-IN', { year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric', hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit', second: '2-digit', hour12: false, timeZone: 'Asia/Kolkata', }).format(new Date(timestamp)) } const handleAdminTransaction = (tx) => { const { stock, amount, type } = tx const stockPrice = 1000 // Assume stock price, replace with actual logic // Calculate profit/loss based on the transaction type if (type === 'Admin Buy Stock') { // Track the total cost of bought stocks const totalCost = (stockData[stock]?.totalCost || 0) + amount * stockPrice const quantity = (stockData[stock]?.quantity || 0) + amount setStockData((prevStockData) => ({ ...prevStockData, [stock]: { totalCost, quantity }, })) setAdminFunds((prevFunds) => ({ ...prevFunds, currentFunds: prevFunds.currentFunds - amount * stockPrice, })) } else if (type === 'Admin Sell Stock') { const totalCost = stockData[stock]?.totalCost || 0 const quantity = stockData[stock]?.quantity || 0 if (quantity >= amount) { const profitOrLoss = amount * stockPrice - (totalCost / quantity) * amount const isProfit = profitOrLoss > 0 setStockData((prevStockData) => ({ ...prevStockData, [stock]: { totalCost: totalCost - (totalCost / quantity) * amount, quantity: quantity - amount, }, })) setAdminFunds((prevFunds) => { const newProfit = isProfit ? prevFunds.profit + profitOrLoss : prevFunds.profit const newLoss = isProfit ? prevFunds.loss : prevFunds.loss + profitOrLoss const profitPercent = (newProfit / prevFunds.totalFunds) * 100 const lossPercent = (newLoss / prevFunds.totalFunds) * 100 return { ...prevFunds, currentFunds: prevFunds.currentFunds + amount * stockPrice, profit: newProfit, profitPercent, loss: newLoss, lossPercent, } }) } } } return (

Account Heading

Your random tagline here

Funds Info
Total Funds {adminFunds.totalFunds}
Current Funds {adminFunds.currentFunds}
Profit {adminFunds.profit}
Profit % {adminFunds.profitPercent.toFixed(2)}%
Loss {adminFunds.loss}
Loss % {adminFunds.lossPercent.toFixed(2)}%
{Object.entries(adminHoldings).map(([stock, quantity], index) => ( ))}
Stock Quantity Price
{stock} {quantity} {}

Token Transactions

{transactions.map((tx, index) => ( ))}
User ID Type Stock Amount Timestamp
{tx.type === 'Admin Buy Stock' ? 'Admin' : tx.userId} {tx.type} {tx.stock} {tx.amount} {formatTimestamp(tx.timestamp)}
) } export default Account
